name: 4Endurance Pro Absolute 84 caps
description_html:
Powerful VO2 max booster based on adaptogens and beta-alanine that helps you sustain higher intensities for longer and recover faster.

  • Boosts oxygen flow and VO2 max
  • Increases ATP energy levels
  • Reduces stress and muscle acidity
  • Accelerates blood flow
  • Speeds up recovery

Product Description

Absolute is a highly-efficient supplement designed to boost VO2 max, strength, and endurance. It helps endurance athletes improve performance faster and push their VO2 max beyond what training alone can achieve.

Formulated with high-potency adaptogens and beta-alanine, Absolute improves oxygen efficiency, enhances blood flow, and reduces muscle acidity — all essential for boosting endurance and performance.

Why adaptogens? They function in several ways. Their most important effect is to reduce sport-related stress, a common issue during endurance exercise. As stress levels rise, adaptogens help regulate them, ensuring your body’s cardiovascular system functions efficiently. This leads to improved vasodilation and higher VO2 max, supporting your ability to train harder and recover faster.

Combine Absolute with our VO2 max training plan for optimal results!

Product Benefits

  • Boosts oxygen flow and VO2 max
  • Increases ATP energy levels
  • Reduces stress and muscle acidity
  • Accelerates blood flow
  • Speeds up recovery
  • Reduces fatigue
  • Increases mental and physical strength

Recommended Use

On training day, take 4 capsules 30 to 45 minutes before exercise.

On rest day, take 2 capsules in the morning and 2 capsules in the afternoon.

The peak of taking Absolute is reached on the 21st day of use, so target the 21st day as the day of a match/race or important training session.

Instructions on how to combine different adaptogen products are found on this link.

After two cycles of taking the product, stop for at least 3 weeks.

WARNING

The use of this product is not recommended for people using beta-blockers or antihypertensives. In this case, please consult your doctor.

The use of this product is also discouraged with people who are prescribed antidepressants, antipsychotics, medications for schizophrenia, bipolar disorder and similar psychiatric medications.

Ingredients and Nutritional Values

  Per serving (4 capsules) %RDA
Beta-alanine 1500 mg *
Cordyceps mycelium extract 800 mg *
of which cordyceps acids 56 mg *
of which polysaccharides 80 mg *
ATPro Matrix 500 mg *
Ashwagandha root extract 150 mg *
Rhodiola root extract 150 mg *
Senactiv
 50 mg *
Chromium 200 µg 500

 *Daily value not established.

Food supplement. Ingredients: beta-alanine, cordyceps mycelium extract standardized to a minimum of 7% cordyceps acid and 10% polysaccharides, ATPro Matrix (calcium pyruvate, sodium salts of orthophosphoric acid, ribose), ashwagandha root extract (Withania Sominfera), rhodiola root extract (Rhodiola Rosea), anti-caking agent: magnesium salts of fatty acids, Senactiv (Panax notoginseng root extract, Roda Roxburghii fruit extract), chromium picolinate, Vegan capsule (colour: calcium carbonate). Bulking agent: magnesium salts of fatty acids. Net quantity: 84 capsules.

name: 4Endurance Pro Vit+Min 90 caps
description_html:
A vitamin and mineral formula that provides all the micronutrients your body needs in one capsule.

  • Boosts your immune system
  • 100% RDA in one capsule
  • With 25 active ingredients

Product Description

Vit+Min is a vitamin and mineral formula designed for endurance athletes who want to get the total daily intake of micronutrients in a single capsule.

It contains 25 active ingredients (13 vitamins and 12 minerals), including vitamin B12 and iron. This allows you to boost your immune system and maintain electrolyte balance, improving your well-being and athletic performance.

Optimal doses

Vit+Min contains the exact doses of vitamins and minerals your body needs — 100% of daily requirements in a single capsule.

Excessive doses of vitamins and minerals are inefficient. Most will not be absorbed and will be eliminated with water, needlessly burdening your digestive system.

The exception is vitamin B12, which athletes require a lot more of. This vitamin is crucial to boost your energy metabolism.

100% daily intake of all micronutrients in a single capsule.

    Product Benefits

    • Boosts your immune system
    • 100% RDA in one capsule
    • With 25 active ingredients
    • Boosts energy metabolism
    • High dose of vitamin B12
    • 90 capsules for 90 days

    Recommended Use

    Take one capsule per day with a meal and plenty of water.

    Ingredients

     

    Per serving (1 capsule)

    %RDA

    Vitamin A

    		 800 mg 100

    Vitamin D

    		 5 mcg 100

    Vitamin E

    		 18 IU
    		 100

    Vitamin K2-MK7

    		 5 mcg
    		 7

    Vitamin B1

    		 1,1 mg 100

    Vitamin B2

    		 1,4 mg 100

    Vitamin B3

    		 16 mg 100

    Vitamin B5

    		 6 mg 100

    Vitamin B6

    		 14 mg 100
    Vitamin B9 200 mcg 100
    Vitamin B12 50 mcg 2000
    Vitamin B7 50 mcg 100
    Vitamin C 80 mg 100
    Calcium 8,4 mg 1
    Magnesium 56 mg 15
    Iron 14 mg 100
    Copper 1 mg 100
    Iodine 150 mcg 100
    Zinc 10 mg 100
    Manganese 2 mg 100
    Potassium 40,2 mg 2
    Selenium 55 mcg 100
    Chromium 40 mcg 100
    Molybdenum 10 mcg 20
    Sodium 23 mg 1

    Food supplement. Ingredients (per capsule): Vitamin A 800 mcg (as retinol acetate) {100% RDA*}, Vitamin D 5 mcg (as cholecalciferol) {100%}, Vitamin E 18 IU (as Dl alpha-tocopheryl acetate) {100% RDA*}, Vitamin K2-MK7 5 mcg (as menaquinone) {7% RDA*}, Vitamin B1 1.1 mg (as thiamine) {100% RDA*}, Vitamin B2 1.4 mg (as riboflavin) {100% RDA*}, Vitamin B3 16 mg (as niacin) {100% RDA*}, Vitamin B5 6 mg (as pantothenic acid) {100% RDA*}, Vitamin B6 14 mg (as pyridoxine) {100% RDA*}, Vitamin B9 200 mcg (as folic acid) {100% PDV*}, Vitamin B12 50 mcg (as cincobalamin) {2000% RDA*}, Vitamin B7 50 mcg (as biotin) {100% PDV*}, Vitamin C 80 mg (as ascorbic acid) {100% RDA*}, Calcium 8.4 mg (as calcium carbonate) {1% RDA*}, Magnesium 56 mg (as magneisum oxide) {15% RDA*}, Iron 14 mg (as ferrous fumarate) {100% RDA*}, Copper 1 mg (as copper sulfate) {100%*}, Iodine 150 mcg (as potassium iodide) {100% RDA*}, Zinc 10 mg (as zinc citrate) {100% RDA*}, Manganese 2 mg (as manganese sulphate) {100 %*}, Potassium 40.2 mg (as potassium chloride) {2%*} Selenium 55 mcg (as sodium selenate) {100% RDA*}, Chromium 40 mcg (as chromium picolinate) {100%*}, Molybdenum 10 mcg (as sodium molybdate) {20%*}, Sodium 23 mg (as sodium chloride) {1%*}. Other ingredients: vegan capsule, bulking agent: magnesium salts of fatty acids. Net quantity: 90 capsules. *RDA = recommended daily intake.

name: 4Endurance Pro Nitro Boost 180 g Fruit Punch
4Endurance Pro Vitamin D3+ (with Coconut Oil) 90 caps
description_html:
The carefully crafted Vitamin D3+ with coconut oil is optimized for athletes' higher micronutrient needs. This formula is enhanced with coconut oil for efficient absorption.

  • Boosts immune system
  • Preserves hormonal balance
  • Increases cognitive function

Product Description

Vitamin D3+ with coconut oil by 4Endurance Pro delivers a potent dosage of 1000 IU, tailored to meet the needs of endurance athletes. Coconut oil provides a healthy source of fat, essential for the absorption of vitamin D, ensuring you get the most out of each dose. 

Additionally, it boosts the immune system, preserves hormonal balance, and increases cognitive abilities. It’s particularly beneficial for athletes, contributing to normal bones and teeth health, and aiding in cell division, especially during months with limited sun exposure. 

Start incorporating Vitamin D3+ (with Coconut Oil) into your diet to strengthen your immune system and ensure you never miss a training session due to a weakened immune system!

Product Benefits

  • Boosts immune system
  • Preserves cognitive balance
  • Increases cognitive abilities
  • Contributes to normal bones
  • Contributes to normal teeth

Recommended Use

Take 1 capsule per day.

Vitamin D is fat soluble. Since the product contains coconut oil, you don't need to intake an additional source of fat.

Ingredients

  Per serving (1 capsule) %RDA
Vitamin D 1000 IU 500%

Food supplement. Ingredients: coconut oil powder (glucose syrup, refined partly hydrogenated coconut oil, casein), maltodextrin, gelatin (capsule), anti-caking agents: magnesium salts of fatty acids and silicon dioxide, cholecalciferol, color: calcium carbonate. May contain traces of CEREALS (GLUTEN), SOY, and MILK. Net quantity: 90 capsules.

name: 4Endurance Pro Natural Vitamin C 60 caps
description_html:
100% natural vitamin C with acerola and rosehip is the perfect boost for your immune system!

  • Boosts your immune system
  • Increases ATP energy levels
  • Protect cells from oxidative stress

Product Description

Natural Vitamin C 4Endurance is a potent supplement combining acerola and rosehip to boost your immune system, increase ATP energy levels, and protect cells from oxidative stress, making it ideal for endurance athletes.

Natural sources of vitamin C

Acerola and rosehip are two excellent natural sources of vitamin C. These ingredients are powerful antioxidants that help protect cells from damage caused by free radicals, which are produced in greater amounts during extended periods of endurance exercise. 

Vitamin C from acerola and rosehip is essential for collagen synthesis and production, aiding in the repair and recovery of tissues, including muscles, tendons, and ligaments. Additionally, they ensure excellent absorption and slow release to maintain constant vitamin C levels in the body.

Support your body’s immune system with the power of Natural Vitamin C!

Product Benefits

  • Boosts immune system
  • Increases ATP energy levels
  • Protects cells from oxidative stress 
  • Contributes to collagen production
  • Reduces muscle cramps
  • Strong antioxidant
  • Preserve cartilage health 

Recommended Use

Take one to two capsules daily with a meal and a sufficient quantity of water.

Ingredients

Food supplement. Ingredients (values per two capsules): rosehip extract (Rosa canina) 1405 mg, of which vitamin C 983 mg, acerola extract (Malpighia glabra) 100 mg, of which vitamin C 17 mg, together vitamin C 1000 mg (1250 %)*, anti-caking agent: magnesium salts of fatty acids and silicon dioxide, maltodextrin, capsule (hydroxypropyl methylcellulose, carrageenan, color: calcium carbonate, modified starch, acidity regulator: potassium acetate). Net quantity: 60 capsules. *Recommended daily intake. May contain traces of nuts, gluten, soy, or milk.

name: 4Endurance Pro Vitamin B Complex 90 caps
description_html:
Vitamin B Complex is especially suitable for you, the athlete who has an increased need for energy.

  • Raise your energy levels
  • Take care of your nervous system
  • Reduce daily stress

Product Description

Vitamin B Complex 4Endurance Pro with 300% B-Complex vitamins with added choline, inositol, and PABA is especially important for you, the endurance athlete, as you are much more dependent than others on increased energy expenditure, faster production (and also deterioration) of red blood cells and a stressed nervous system.

The product contains choline, which is the main transmitter of signals in the form of nerve stimulation to the brain. It affects your memory, concentration and well-being, and prevents you from hitting a "wall" or running out of energy later on. It also allows you to have normal coordination and balance, which is especially important for athletes.

Vitamin B Complex allows you to stay focused even during long and strenuous workouts when stress hormones and inflammatory factors are particularly high.

This includes vitamin B6, which plays a key role in the mental and general well-being of the athlete, and vitamin B12, which gives the body the energy it needs.

Inositol and PABA are important signalling substances involved in various biochemical processes. These include the regulation of blood sugar and the normalization of hormonal balance.

Vitamin B12 is an essential vitamin that your body needs but cannot produce on its own. It supports the normal functioning of nerve cells and is necessary for the production of red blood cells. Vegetarians and vegans are particularly deficient in it, as they cannot get it into their bodies through natural foods.

Products Benefits

  • Increases energy levels
  • Improves stress response
  • Reduces fatigue
  • Improves psychophysical well-being
  • Ensures normal energy conversion
  • Important link in DNA synthesis
  • With PABA and Inositol

Recommened Use

Take one capsule per day, ideally between meals in the first half of the day.

Ingredients and Nutrition Facts

  Per serving (1 capsule)
 %RDA
Vitamin B1 (as thiamine)
 3,3 mg
 300
Vitamin B2 (as riboflavin)
 4,2 mg 300
Vitamin B3 (as nicotinamide)
 48 mg 300
Vitamin B5 (as calcium pantothenate)
 18 mg 300
Vitamin B6 (as pyrodixine)
 3 mg 300

 150 mcg 300

 1200 mg

Vitamin B12 (as cobalamin)
 7,5 mcg
 300
Choline bitartrate
 20 mg
 *
Myo-Inositol 50 mg *
PABA 25 mg *

 *RDA is not established.

Food supplement. Ingredients: Vitamin B1, Vitamin B2, Vitamin B3, Vitamin B5, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B7, Vitamin B9, Vitamin B12, Choline Bitartrate, Myo-Inositol, PABA, Other Ingredients: Vegan capsule, lubricant: magnesium stearate. May contain traces of oats, barley, wheat (GLUTEN), fish, milk (LACTOSE), or soya (SOY). Net quantity: 60 capsules.

name: 4Endurance Pro TG Omega 3 60 softgels
description_html:
Omega-3 fatty acids are a vital supplement for your health and athletic performance.

  • Boosts the cardiovascular system
  • Improves brain health
  • Protects cells from oxidative stress

Product Description

TG Omega 3 4Endurance Pro is a naturally obtained and highly absorbable source of omega-3 fatty acids with vitamin E, perfect for athletes who want to support their athletic performance.

Each capsule contains 1000 mg of omega-3 fatty acids, including 180 mg of EPA, 120 mg of DHA, and 10 mg of vitamin E. This supplement is especially beneficial for enhancing cardiovascular health, boosting brain function, and protecting cells from oxidative stress.

Why triglyceride omega-3?

Triglyceride forms of omega-3 fatty acids are naturally obtained from small fish, allowing for better absorption by the body. They are also more easily integrated into cell membranes, enhancing their usability.

Moreover, the triglyceride omega-3 fatty acids have demonstrated a greater ability to elevate blood levels of omega-3 fatty acids, which can contribute to improved overall health outcomes.

Take care of the health of your cardiovascular system and your brain with TG Omega 3 4Endurance Pro!

Product Benefits

  • Boosts the cardiovascular system
  • Improves brain health
  • Protects cells from oxidative stress
  • Boosts the immune system
  • Strengthens joints and ligaments
  • Superior triglyceride form

Recommended Use

Take 1 softgel with a meal, preferably lunch.

WARNING! If you are taking medication, such as anticoagulants, consult your doctor before supplementing omega-3 fatty acids.

Ingredients

 

Per serving (1 softgel)

 RDA

Omega-3 fatty acids 

 1000 mg *

of which EPA 18%

 180 mg *
of which DHA 12% 120 mg *
Vitamin E (as Dl-alpha-tocopherol) 10 mg 83.3%

*Recommended daily value not established.

Food supplement. Ingredients: Fish oil, Vitamin E (as DL-alpha-tocopherol). Other ingredients: capsule: gelatin (bovine), stabilizer: glycerine, purified water. This product contains FISH and products thereof. Net quantity: 60 softgels.

name: 4Endurance Pro Glutamine
description_html:
100% pure fermented L-glutamine — the key amino acid for muscle recovery and gut support.

  • Improves muscle recovery
  • Enhances protein and glycogen synthesis
  • Prevents muscle breakdown

Product Description

Glutamine 4Endurance Pro is designed for endurance athletes and individuals engaging in intense or prolonged physical activity — especially during periods of caloric deficit, heavy training loads, or physical stress.

Glutamine is a key amino acid that helps rebuild muscle fibers, supports gut health, and strengthens the immune system. During periods of physical stress, your body may not produce enough to cover increased needs — which is where supplementation will make a difference.

What Is Glutamine?

Glutamine is a naturally produced amino acid that becomes conditionally essential under physical stress, such as during intense training or caloric restriction. It plays a role in many critical functions, from muscle regeneration to maintaining gut integrity.

Supplementing with glutamine helps support:

  • Faster muscle recovery
  • Protein and glycogen synthesis
  • Immune system maintenance
  • Gut health and integrity

Why Choose Glutamine 4Endurance Pro?

Unlike standard glutamine supplements, Glutamine 4Endurance Pro uses a fermented source, ensuring:

  • Better absorption
  • Improved digestibility
  • No added fillers or artificial ingredients

Choose 100% fermented glutamine for better recovery and gut support!

Product Benefits

  • Improves muscle recovery
  • Enhances protein and glycogen synthesis
  • Prevents muscle breakdown
  • Strengthens immune function
  • Supports gut health
  • 100% fermented glutamine

Recommended Use

Mix 1 scoop with water. Take up to 3 scoops per day.

💡 Pro tip!

If you are in a caloric deficit:

  • Take 1 scoop before and 1 scoop after exercise.
  • On rest days, take 1 scoop before breakfast and 1 scoop before bed.

If you are in caloric surplus:

  • Take 1 scoop after exercise.
  • On rest days, take 1 scoop before breakfast or before bed.

Ingredients

Food supplement. Ingredients: 100% pure fermented L-glutamine. Store in a cool, dry place. Net quantity: 500 g.

name: 4Endurance Pro Calcium Zinc Magnesium 60 caps
description_html:
Three crucial minerals — calcium, zinc, and magnesium — in one high-absorption formula.

  • Reduces tiredness and fatigue
  • Helps with electrolyte balance
  • Contributes to normal muscle function

Product Description

Calcium Zinc Magnesium 4Endurance Pro is a triple mineral support formula designed for endurance athletes who want to take advantage of its numerous health and performance benefits.

This formula offers high absorption and increased efficiency in reducing tiredness and fatigue, relaxing muscles, preventing muscle cramps, and improving post-exercise recovery.

Citrate forms

Citrate forms of minerals provide better absorption, higher bioavailability, and are easier on the stomach.

  • Calcium citrate contributes to normal muscle function, nerve transmission, and adds to stronger bones
  • Magnesium citrate is one of the most effective forms of magnesium that is crucial for muscle relaxation and recovery, especially in athletes or older adults.
  • Zinc citrate boosts the immune system, protects cells from oxidative stress, and preserves bone strength — the perfect choice for athletes.

Get three vital minerals in one high-absorption formula with Calcium Zinc Magnesium 4Endurance Pro  — your daily supplement for fatigue reduction, better recovery, and muscle relaxation! 

Product Benefits

  • Reduces tiredness and fatigue
  • Helps with electrolyte balance
  • Contributes to normal muscle function
  • Helps with the prevention of muscle cramps
  • Helps with muscle recovery
  • Promotes energy-yielding metabolism
  • Boosts ATP energy levels
  • Supports bone health
  • Improves protein synthesis
  • Enhances sleep

Recommended Use

Take 2 capsules per day, preferably with a meal.

Ingredients

 

Per serving (2 capsules)

 RDA

Calcium (as calcium citrate)

 667 mg 70%*

Magnesum (as magnesium citrate)

 267  mg 21%*
Zinc (as zinc citrate) 10 mg 31%*

* RDA

Food supplement. Ingredients: calcium citrate, magnesium citrate, zinc citrate, hydroxypropyl methylcellulose (vegan capsule shell), anti-caking agent: magnesium stearate. Net quantity: 60 capsules.

name: Nduranz Nrgy Drink 45 1200 g (Watermelon)
description_html:
High-performance isotonic sports drink containing an advanced electrolyte mix and 45 grams of carbohydrates per serving that is easy on the stomach.

✔ Optimized for high energy intake
✔ Preserves glycogen stores
✔ Sustains optimal hydration
✔ Prevents muscle cramps
✔ No digestive issues

Product Description

Nrgy Drink 45 is the optimal fuel for high-performance athletes who need a high carbohydrate intake and optimal hydration without unnecessary ingredients and digestive issues.

Each serving delivers 45 grams of carbohydrates using the scientifically proven 1:0.8 glucose to fructose ratio and contains the Nduranz Electrolyte Mix that replicates exactly what you lose through sweat.

CARBOHYDRATE RATIO

Nrgy Drink 45 is based on the Nduranz carbohydrate ratio, a 1:0.8 ratio between glucose (maltodextrin) and fructose.

It is scientifically proven to be the optimal ratio, which allows the highest absorption of 90 grams of carbohydrates per hour without burdening your digestive system and causing digestive issues.

ELECTROLYTE MIX

Nrgy Drink 45 contains the Nduranz Electrolyte Mix, an advanced mix of minerals that matches the electrolytes you lose with sweat.

This mix enables optimal hydration during intense exercise without causing digestive issues, which are a common downside of many electrolyte formulas.

COMBINING WITH OTHER FUELING PRODUCTS

For best results, combine Nrgy Drink 45 with other Nduranz fueling products. They all use the same carbohydrate ratio, and those that include electrolytes share the same Nduranz Electrolyte Mix — minimizing digestive issues.

INFORMED SPORT CERTIFIED

Every batch of Nrgy Drink 45 is tested for banned substances under the Informed Sport program. That means you can fuel with confidence — your performance stays clean and your reputation safe.

Keep your energy high and hydration on point with Nrgy Drink 45!

Nrgy Drink 45 vs. Nrgy Drink 90

Nrgy Drink 90 is a sports drink adapted for higher energy intake. Although it offers the same amount of CHO per scoop (22.5 g) as Nrgy Drink 45, the amount of electrolytes and the strength of the taste are adapted to the higher amount in a single bottle.

This way, Nrgy Drink 90 ensures that you get just the right amount of electrolytes in one serving (4 scoops) and a suitably strong taste.

If you were to mix 2 portions of Nrgy Drink 45 (4 scoops) in a bidon, you would have double the amount of electrolytes in one bottle and a drink with an extremely strong taste. The former, in particular, opens up the possibility of digestive problems. 

Nrgy Drink 90 also allows you to intake more CHO with less fluid, as you can intake 90 grams with just 500 ml of water. Nrgy Drink 45 requires 1000 ml of water for an intake of 90 grams. 

Product Benefits

  • Optimized for high energy intake
  • Sustains optimal hydration
  • No digestive issues
  • With or without citric acid
  • Prevents muscle cramps
  • Preserve glycogen stores
  • Simplifies fueling
  • No artificial sweeteners
  • Informed sport certified

Recommended Use

Consume 1 to 2 servings per hour of intense exercise.

For 1 serving, mix 2 scoops with 500 ml of water (in hot conditions 750 ml).

Use the Nduranz Fuel Calculator to easily estimate your required energy intake during exercise.

Ingredients and Nutrition Facts

 

100 g

1 serving (48 g)

Energy

 1569 kJ / 375 kcal 753 kJ / 180 kcal

Total Fat

 0 g 0 g
Saturated Fat

 

 0 g 0 g

Total Carbohydrates

 93.8 g 45 g

Sugars

Protein

 0 g 0 g

Salt

Nduranz Electrolyte Mix

 2.28 g 1.09 g

Total Sodium

 958 mg 460 mg 

Total Chloride

 1094 mg 525 mg

Food supplement. Ingredients: maltodextrin, fructose, Nduranz Electrolyte Mix (sodium chloride, sodium citrate, potassium chloride, tricalcium citrate, trimagnesium citrate), natural aroma. Citric Acid* No known allergens. *only with citric acid flavors. Net Weight: 1200 g.
